full_summary:
## Government Contract Opportunity: Acquisition of Sodium Formate

### Contract Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of Transport (TC) for the acquisition of Sodium Formate in bulk quantities.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Title**: T3033-220244
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS3864968106-Doc3865022964
* **Publication Date**: February 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: February 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Contract Type**: Competitive – Open Bidding

### Contract Requirements

* **Location of Performance**: Québec, Canada
* **Quantity**: Bulk quantities of Sodium Formate (1000 kg bags)
* **End User**: Department of Transport (TC)

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the lowest price.

### Instructions to Bidders

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on February 24, 2023. Bids submitted after this deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Sonia Langis, PSPC
* **Email**: sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not available
* **Fax**: Not available
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada, K1A 0S5

### Additional Information

This contract is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

You may access the RFP document through the following URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15371485?extsite=MTUzNzE0ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Schedule Summary

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 16, 2023
